citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15 AM on
12/9/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on door, ringing doorbell, and calling
contact phone numbers. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:15 AM on 
12/9/2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on door, ringing doorbell, and calling 
contact phone numbers. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
